nodes.bodyText: Does it make sense that the same line is next to each other here?

Do you mean the same line of  ResponseField.forString("__typename", "__typename", null, false, null)?  If yes that's correct, first line used by actual field __typename and the second one is not involved in parsing response, but it needs to be there to have right field index.
I'm thinking of making changes to remove RESPONSE_FIELDS  all together, as index based access to the response field meta looks fragile.
